11.title: Bathrooms in poor service
11.description: Recently I've noticed the bathrooms are of poor condition and would like something to be done about it

resolution.title: We've hired new janitors
resolution.description: Thank you for your response, we have hired new janitors to increase the amount of maintainance perfomed in the bathrooms

12.title: Mrs X comes into lectures with no clothes on
12.description: Recently I've seen Mrs X come into lectures bare naked and would like something to be done about it xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Fusce aliquet lobortis libero. Nullam venenatis fermentum dolor eget porta. Integer ut commodo felis.
